summary: The childhood, adolescence, and incredible adult years of Al Hirshfeld, celebrated creator of thousands of line drawings of famous people - many in the entertainment industry - over a span ... See full summary Â»
cast: Julie Andrews|Lauren Bacall|Carol Channing|Cy Coleman|Joan Collins|Betty Comden|Margo Feiden|Jules Feiffer|Frank Gifford|Kathie Lee Gifford|Robert Goulet|Adolph Green|Dolly Haas|Jerry Herman|Al Hirschfeld|Geoffrey Holder|Paula Laurence|Robert Loggia|Roger Moore|Phyllis Newman|Joseph Papp|Maria Riva|Chita Rivera|Daniel Selznick|Leslie Uggams|Mike Wallace|Barbara Walters|Nina Hirschfeld West|Katharine Hepburn
title: The Line King: The Al Hirschfeld Story
